subtitle: Into the Deep
about: A spotlight film on Emmy Award-winning underwater cinematographer Alfredo Baroso / filmed on location in La Ventana, Mexico -- a small fishing village on the eastern side of Baja California. Our production team spent 2 days with Emmy Award-winning underwater cinematographer Alfredo Baroso at his home and in the Sea of Cortez, capturing his heartfelt story and awe-inspiring filming process
